title: Did Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Pass the ‘Change Unfit New Textbooks Act’?
subtitle: Robert Edward Lee was an American and Confederate soldier, best known as a commander of the Confederate States Army.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez passed a 'Change Unfit New Textbooks Act' requiring that school textbooks be scrubbed of any mention of Confederate General Robert E. Lee.
